intro.subtitle: Hi! I'm Jorge Garc√≠a. Passionate about Front-End development and UX/UI design. Located in Valencia, Spain.

about.title: ABOUT
about.content: From a very young age I loved to design and draw. When I started programming, I always had a special taste for layout, information structure and style. As a Front-End programmer I have knowledge of HTML, CSS, Javascript, TypeScript, Mock-up tools and sketches like Figma, as well as the use of these technologies to create responsive websites. I have been trained in areas of teamwork and constant communication with the client for a good product quality.
